message.body: Hey gabi. I got ur msg. Thanks for that. I hope u will get ur ca4 repaired by tomorrow. The megabus station changed from uvm campus to doubletree hotel on williston road. I should be arriving there around 11pm.
Ok, enjoy your trip, ill see you tomorrow night

Hey gabi. Im going to take the bus from hartford soon. The bus is running behind schedule by about 30 mnts. So maybe i will arrive at burklington after 11pm. Sorry for that, i will send you a msg when i pass by montpelier. Thanx.
Just received your msg. Thank you anyway and sorry for the inconvenience.
